body_html: I have cheked in several improvements to the upstream eigen repository such as this one. I have also updated the TensorFlow codebase to pull a recent version of Eigen that contains these improvements. This should fix the performance regression issue.
body_text: I have cheked in several improvements to the upstream eigen repository such as this one. I have also updated the TensorFlow codebase to pull a recent version of Eigen that contains these improvements. This should fix the performance regression issue.
body: I have cheked in several improvements to the upstream eigen repository such as [this one](https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/a0661a2bb16512dc4359c243db1dbeb9bc32b266). I have also updated the TensorFlow codebase to pull a recent version of Eigen that contains these improvements. This should fix the performance regression issue.
